XMLATTRIB Struct Reference

Definition of a XML attribute. More...

#include <xmlreader.h>


Data Fields

STRING * strTag
 String pointer to attribute name.
STRING * strContent
 String pointer to attribute content.
XMLPAR * psParent
 Pointer to parent XML parameter (tag).

Detailed Description

Definition of a XML attribute.

Each attribute of a XML tag is represented by this structure. Use the XMLATTRIB_create function for creation of a new XML attribute.
